system.type: Suffered Critical Wounds and left permenantly incapacitated. May have additional costs.
system.descriptor: The Mechanicus rebuilds the character with replacement limbs, organs and more, to bring them back to a functional state. But not without permenant loss. They are unlikely to offer it for free.
system.uses: Lost or damaged organs/limbs are replaced with common craftsmanship cybernetics. If a Tech-Priest any lost implants are replaced. Suffer 1d10 Insanity and permenantly reduce Fellowship by 1d10.
